title: What’s a Beat?
content: In the beginning, there was a noise that repeated. That repetition became the heartbeat of music — the beat. Whether it’s the crash of a drum kit or the pulse of a synth bass, the beat is the pattern you can march to, clap along with, or nod your head to.

title: Finding the Groove
content: A groove is more than a beat — it’s the feel that makes you lean in. Grooves layer rhythms together, combining kick drums, snares, hi-hats, and bass lines to create motion. Listen for how instruments speak to each other to lock in the groove.
